reviews.sentence: hotel was beautiful and clean check in was great parking was easy and many food options pricey but ok.
Clean and beautiful welcoming staff and great price and value.

The Check In process was a nightmare. The Check In process was a nightmare. There were no signs telling us where the Check in desk was located we walked around the casino for about 45 minutes trying to find someone to direct us. Then we had to stand in line for about 30 minutes to check in. Employees were walking the line giving water but of course they ran out before it got to us. The room was clean but Pretty basic for the price we paid I was expecting more. The hotel was noisy and we did not get a good nights rest.

Great Renovation with rough Check In. Had a bad experience with Check In when our room was not ready at the time we arrived and we arrived at 10 PM. Eventually after an hour later I went back and then they gave us our key to go into our room. Other then that the room was nicely renovated and clean. They did take care of us after we had the bad check in experience. There is great Rock and Pop memorabilia on the walls like any traditional Hard Rock but I do appreciate the memorabilia of the New Jersey famous singers. The wifi is excellent in our hotel room. Very fast and no need of any special codes to access it. Our room was nice Eating steak at Roberts is great a little pricey but great food. Other then that Hard Rock has nice staff and they did a great job in the renovation of the old Trump Taj majal.
Hard Rock. Clean room great rate nice hotel and casino.

The property is extremely clean as it is newly renovated. Decorations throughout the hotel was unique costumes and a lot of choices of restaurant albeit a little expensive. Swimming pool was okay and my kids liked it. My complaint is that overall service was really slow. When we asked for more towels we had to call a few times and waited for a long time. After 12 am our next door was making a lot of noise so we called the desk to complain. Nothing happened and they bacame noisier so we called the desk again. After about 20 minutes when the noise was settled a security came and started banging our door not the one who made the noise and he ended up waking my kids up. As a parent of 2 young children that made the whole night so much more difficult. They clearly have some communication issues between staffs.
Super Clean and New. Came to AC for the weekend and found great prices to stay at the Hard rock. The hotel is basically brand new and extremely well kept. Everything was excellent.

Amazing stay for our anniversary. This was my anniversary trip and all I can say is that it was an amazing experience. I got everything i needed from my experience. We had fun in the casino on the slots even though we did not win. Got the relaxation in multiple ways that i was looking for from the amazing spa and the comfortable room. The restaurants were great. We had dinner at the HardRock and at Sugar Factory. The food was amazing and well priced. I am so glad we went there.

Be aware of hidden charges. The hotel is in OK location. Booked the hotel online and paid in advance. However the big surprise was when it came to check out. They charged 250 as resort Fee. Asked what the charge is for and they could not explain other than to say it is a resort fee. Also had to pay extra for parking which is understandable.

The room itself was spotless and nice. We stayed in a non smoking room and while our room did not have any residual odors the stench of cigarette smoke and marijuana in the hallway was ridiculous. The casino was lively and upbeat. We had lunch at The Sugar Factory for the experience only. it is very overpriced. I read reviews before going and was not expecting spectacular food. It was just OK but again we went for the experience. Overall we enjoyed ourselves and would stay here again if the price is right.
Casino crowed hard to play as well as tables very expensive.
The price of the food was real pricey. The bathtub was to high to step over in that was very risky.
I like the use of the gym even though it was not very big and you had to pay extra for it had some issue with my toilet it was not working properly.

Independence Day getaway. I rated this overall experience very well however their were some concerns. Apparently the hotel was double booked so when we arrived the manager needed to be called to make arrangements for us. Our family could n’t be next to each other but they made up for this by upgrading one of the rooms. The person who checked us in was nice but shared how understaffed they were. The food was very pricey and just okay tasting. 2 mixed drinks were 25. Check out was long. We could n’t check out via the TV. It took several phone calls and transfers to different people before we could check out. The hotel was phenomenal live entertainment and lots of shops inside and on the boardwalk.

Poor service. We stayed for 2 nights. First night was good. 2nd night however we were woken up around midnight by a staff member knocking at our door because apparently the room was showing empty on their system. After answering their questions. We tried to go to sleep since we had to leave early as we had an 8 hours drive home ahead of us. But we were woken up again around 1h30 AM by front desk who seemed confused as to the room number we were in. And then later on followed by the people in the room in front of us yelling and cursing at 4 am. Needless to say no sleep before a long drive. The next morning we went to the front desk to inquire about the issue and asked for either a complimentary night since we were not about to drive for 89 hours without sleep. The hotel refused and refused to credit us for the sleepless night. They also could not figure out what happened and how we were booked in 2 rooms at the same time. We had to take an extra night elsewhere at our cost. For that reason service is zero in my opinion. The most basic service a hotel is supposed to provide is ability to sleep in the room you paid for. Instead it is the hotel staff that prevented me from sleeping that night. Will not be returning.

The overall beauty of the hotel and casino was amazing. The restaurants were second to none. However I was a bit disappointed in the quality of our room King Classic Suite. For 500 per night it was an average hotel room. I expected the room to be a little plush. Two of the bath towels were old and frayed and each had a large hole in it. Although the shower was glass enclosed it leaked a puddle of water on the floor even with the shower door securely closed tight. we had to soak up the water with towels each time we used the shower. Lastly the 20 per day parking fee should have been complimentary for hotel guests and the additional 24 PER DAY RESORT FEE was absolutely ridiculous. We reported our concerns upon check out. I will only stay if the price of the rooms were reduced.

Cleanliness not good. Lots of hair in bathroom and dried spills on the window sill. Other dirt. The housekeeping was inconsistent and often items were forgotten or toiletries coffee cups etc. Really unexpected lack of attention to detail for the price paid for our stay here.

Parking garage staff is rude Security even more so. Lost our parking pass but had a picture of it on my phone. One atendent took the picture and allowed us to park the other got nasty with us and called security when we refused to pay a second time. Had us sit for 45 minutes with two screaming babies until someone finally verified we were guests and let us through. Has left a very bad taste for this establishment. Pretty sure mold came out of the bathtub drain on the last night there to top it off.

Customer service was horrible. Very rude. I called down to front desk and asked a question and nearly got my head bitten off through the phone. It was our anniversary and that ’s one hotel I ’l never visit again. They ruined it. I asked to check out an hour later than 11 am and the lady said NO unles you want to pay 30 um hell no I paid 63 for the room. Then I heard the cleaning lady in the hall tell a guest she can stay later at no cost she ’l just wait to clean her room. That ’s BULST. Never again hard rock never again.
Surprise costs. my only complaint was I was charged an extra 49 after we left.
